name: ANKUR YUVA CHETNA SHIVIR
briefDescription: Ankur Yuva Chetna Shivir- AYCS was founded in early 1986 and registered in Aug, 1986 under society registration. It is an implementing agency based in Utter Pradesh working with number of voluntary groups, development agencies and the Government on various issues.As a grassroots level non-governmental organization (NGO), we realize that people themselves are the best judge of what they need. Our main aim has been to convert the individual dreams and aspirations into a collective consciousness through community convergence and participatory approach with the tools of self as well as social awareness, we endeavor to help the community under start how to convert its talent dreams into a reality.
